price: Reci: "Allah istinu govori!" – da slijedite vjeru Ibrahimovu, koji je pravi vjernik bio. On u višebošce nije spadao!
arabic: قُلۡ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُۗ فَٱتَّبِعُواْ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul ṣadaqa al-lahu fa-ittabiʿū millata ib'rāhīma ḥanīfan wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna
